name: Scuffed Airforce Training
description:
Scuffed Airorce Training is a game in which you fly various vehicles through challenging levels. You can unlock more vehicles the more stars you get. Stars are earned by completing a level with a fast time.

Current Features:

  • 3 Unique Vehicles
  • Timed Levels
  • Powerups
  • Star Rating System
  • 18 Stages (6 for each vehicle)

This is my first published game, and I hope someone might like it. I have little background in programming or making games in general so it might be a little "scuffed". But if you have any suggestions on improving the game I'm all ears.

Enjoy!
